sqlMap.insert: insert into post (id, blogId, title, contents, dateCreated) values(#id#, #blog.id#, #title#, #contents#, #dateCreated#)
sqlMap.update: update post set title = #title#, contents = #contents# where id = #id# and blogId = #blog.id#
sqlMap.delete: delete from post where id = #id# and blogId = #blog.id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT p.id as id FROM post p join blogs b on b.id = p.blogId where p.blogId = #blogId# order by p.id desc limit 1
